title: Foxworth Friday: Snyder Story, Geno Smith's Revival, Week 6 Showdowns
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss the Daniel Snyder story (6:26), Geno Smith's return to glory (30:20), Patrick Mahomes vs. Josh Allen, buying into Jalen Hurts (42:01), and Steve Wilks' first move as the interim HC in Carolina (47:42).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
